title: Israel Is A Homeland For Jewish People â€” But Is It A Jewish State?
teaser: Israel was founded as a homeland for the Jewish people. But a proposal to define it in law as a Jewish state has become a hot-button political issue. Opponents say it's a undemocratic mix of religion and law.
